droidrun-controller/portal-apk/app/src/m.description: Enhanced color palette with comprehensive color system: accent colors with light/dark/container variants, gradient colors for modern effects, glow colors for status indicators, button/icon/card/shimmer colors for UI components, and scrim colors for overlays. All follow semantic naming convention (accent_[color], accent_[color]_light, accent_[color]_dark, accent_[color]_container, accent_[color]_container_high).

Comprehensive shape appearance system added to themes.xml with 40+ ShapeAppearance styles organized by component type: Base shapes (ExtraSmall/Small/Medium/Large/ExtraLarge/Full), Card shapes, Dialog/BottomSheet shapes, Chip shapes, TextField shapes, Button shapes, Status indicators, Navigation shapes, Cut corner variants, and Special component shapes. All follow Material Design 3 conventions with ShapeAppearance.Portal.* naming pattern.

Debug Tools and Connection Info sections now use consistent patterns: 44dp icon containers with icon_container_background.xml, 18dp start padding, 16dp vertical padding, 14dp margin from icon container to text. Connection info has icons (ic_network for TCP, ic_terminal for ADB) with accent_cyan and accent_green tints respectively. Both sections use dividers like the Status section.

Animated state selector for status indicators with 200ms cross-fade transitions. Uses view states for status mapping: activated=on (green), focused=warning (yellow), focused+selected=pending (blue), default=off (red). Apply to views and set view states programmatically to trigger smooth transitions.

Icon enhancement patterns: Use consistent 24dp dimensions, strokeWidth of 2dp for main elements and 1.5dp for detail elements, strokeLineCap="round" and strokeLineJoin="round" for softer appearance, fillColor="#FFFFFF" for solid icons and strokeColor="#FFFFFF" for outlined icons. Hash/pound symbol (#) is a good representation for "index" concepts.

Status indicator animation pattern in MainActivity.kt: Uses combination of StateListDrawable cross-fade (200ms) for color transitions, scale pulse animation (1.15x) with AnimatorSet for state changes, fade out/in for text transitions, and scale animations (0.95x) for button text changes. Animation timing constants: ANIMATION_DURATION=250ms, ANIMATION_DURATION_SHORT=150ms. Smart animation triggers only when state actually changes (tracked via prevState variables).
